actions.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Warner. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 9.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: An original resolution providing for members on the part of the Senate of the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.

summary.text: Elects Senators John Warner, Thad Cochran, Mitch McConnell, Wendell H. Ford, and Daniel K. Inouye to the Joint Committee on Printing. Elects Senators Ted Stevens, John Warner, Thad Cochran, Daniel Patrick Moynihan, and Dianne Feinstein to the Joint Committee on the Library of Congress.

titles.title: An original resolution providing for members on the part of the Senate of the Joint Committee on Printing and the Joint Committee of Congress on the Library.
